text.title: Welcome Home | Finally Playing Hogwarts Legacy For the First Time | Part 1
text.p: I can't believe today is the day I
really just I can't fathom that this is
actually happening right now the day
that I have been dreaming of my entire
life is here I want to give a huge huge
thank you to Warner Brothers and
Avalanche for providing me with a review
code for the game the entire experience
with this game has meant so much to me
if this is your first time to my channel
you may not know but I was one of the
very lucky people to be flown out to LA
to be able to play this game early for 2
hours and those two hours were probably
some of the best hours of my life that
trip in and of itself was incredible I
met so many amazing people I got to talk
to the developers behind this game and
with that entire experience it made me
want more I walked away from that entire
experience just so excited and so
grateful for everything I got to see and
all the people I got to meet so those
are all the reasons why this game is
even more special to me even before I've
officially jumped in and played this
it's something I'm never going to forget
for as long as I live so I really hope
this playr does the game Justice and
again just a huge thank you to Warner
Brothers for everything literally
everything that has happened to me
within the past month otherwise I don't
really think this game needs too much of
an intro I mean we all know we all know
what's about to happen I just cannot
wait to jump in and share in this
experience with you guys create our
Legacy talk about it in the comments I
want to see what you guys decide to do
your first playthrough I think the
amount of choice and customization in
this game is going to be absolutely
incredible I can't wait to finally like
get good at the combat the two hours
that I got to play when we just kind of
were thrown in was was definitely a huge
learning curve so I excited to
experience the game organically learn as
I go be able to customize my spells the
way I want to and just have fun that's
why I'm here I just want to have fun
with this game I even have my wand at
the ready this is Hermione's official
wand that I got from Universal in
Florida years ago and it's one of my
prized possessions anyway with all that
being said I don't want to take up any
more of your time I just want to jump in
and play so hold on to your broomsticks
I was going to say pants but broomsticks
seems a little bit more appropriate hold
on to your broomsticks we're going
in we are pleased to inform you that you
have been accepted at Hogwarts School of

student term begins on the 1st of
September preliminary supplies have been

on your journey to the castle as you may
be aware the decree of the reasonable
